title: Professor Finger builds a bridge
creator_credit: Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description:
Episode of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
Dodo and the bird come to the rescue of the Professor when his new inventions of a plastic bridge over a ravine cannot take the stress. The remains of the bridge become a ferry instead.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
